list.name: PULSE-MODULATOR
list.description: Pam triggers her turret to emit a pulse that heals allies inside the turret's range, including herself, for x health.
list.descriptionHtml: Pam triggers her turret to emit a pulse that heals allies inside the turret's range, including herself, for x health.

list.name: SCRAPSUCKER
list.description: Each hit from Pam's next attack removes x% of opposing Brawlers' maximum ammo. Pam reclaims x% of the ammo for herself.
list.descriptionHtml: Each hit from Pam's next attack removes x% of opposing Brawlers' maximum ammo. Pam reclaims x% of the ammo for herself.
